column5: ......was in Alexandria,Ont today and noticed many trees had already started their change. Short Fall and right into a long Winter is my prediction.Sure we will have some more warm/hot weather but thats what I think and I am stickin wid it

either that or you were looking at a stretch of REALLY stressed trees. If a tree is under a lot of stress... ie. root damage or foliar damage, it will change really early, i've seen trees change as early as june.... but the year after that they die lol
